about_the_game:
Story

Many years ago, a brave hero defeated Rorudark, an evil wizard that tried to destroy the world. Rorudark was trapped in the depths of the world, but centuries later his anger and extreme power set him free, and how revenge Rorudark cursed all the animals and creatures in the world, which are now attacking people. Now our last hope is you, who carry the Blade's Legacy!


A precise platformer full of action

- Blade's Legacy is an incredible adventure for one player, in an immersive world and with challenging stages!
- Double jump, crouch, climb walls and attack your enemies to pass the levels!
- The game has 100 different and lovely levels, in a total of 10 different worlds!
- 30 different items, with 11 powerful swords to buy and use!
- Over 50 different enemies, with challenging and immersive fights!
- Lots of different obstacles, platforms and traps!
- An incredible soundtrack, with awesome musics and sounds!

Blade's Legacy

You are the last hope of this world, defeat your enemies and Rorudark to bring peace to this land. Use your abilities to climb walls, double jump, go through obstacles and jump across platforms in 10 different worlds!


Enemies


The game features over 50 different enemies spread across 10 different worlds, plus an amazing boss fight against Rorudark! As the player progresses through the levels, the difficulty of the game and enemies increases and becomes more challenging!
